H1.text: who played john connor in the original terminator. Nick Stahl

H2.text: who played john connor in the original terminator. Thomas Dekker

H3.text: who played john connor in the original terminator. Edward Furlong

A4.text: Linda Hamilton as Sarah Connor, a young diner waitress and the Terminator's target, who is soon to be the mother of the future leader of the resistance, John.

A5.text: Michael Biehn as Kyle Reese, a member of the resistance against Skynet sent back in time to protect Sarah.

A6.text: Edward Furlong played John Connor in Terminator 2: Judgment Day.

A7.text: Stahl replaced Edward Furlong in Terminator 3: Rise of the Machines (2003) as John Connor

A8.text: Christian Bale took over the role of John Connor in Terminator Salvation
